collections.name: Customers Choice
collections.description: Dried apricots packed with flavor and natural sweetness. A perfect snack to support your health with antioxidants, vitamins, and dietary fiber.

collections.name: New Arivals
collections.description: Sweet and chewy black sultanas, rich in natural sugars and essential nutrients. Ideal for snacking, baking, or adding to salads for extra flavor.

collections.name: Hot Sales
collections.description: Premium dried blueberries packed with antioxidants. A perfect snack to boost your energy, promote brain health, and satisfy your sweet cravings.

topSales.name: Acacia Honey
topSales.description: Pure acacia honey with a mild and sweet flavor. Known for its natural antibacterial properties, this honey is perfect for sweetening your drinks, spreads, or adding to desserts.

topSales.name: Face Scrub
topSales.description: A rejuvenating face scrub made with natural ingredients to cleanse and exfoliate, leaving your skin feeling fresh and radiant. Ideal for all skin types.

topSales.name: Face Wash
topSales.description: Gentle face wash with natural herbs, perfect for daily cleansing. Removes impurities and helps maintain a healthy, glowing complexion.

topSales.name: Honey Roasted Muesli
topSales.description: Crunchy and nutritious honey roasted muesli made with premium ingredients, perfect for a healthy breakfast or snack to start your day.

newArrivals.name: Kashmiri Kesar
newArrivals.description: Premium Kashmiri saffron known for its rich color and distinct flavor. Ideal for enhancing the taste and aroma of your dishes, desserts, and beverages while providing health benefits like boosting immunity.

newArrivals.name: Kesari Milk Masala
newArrivals.description: A fragrant blend of saffron and spices, perfect for preparing rich and aromatic Kesari milk. Offers a comforting and healthy drink with natural antioxidants and calming properties.

newArrivals.name: Mongra Saffron
newArrivals.description: High-quality Mongra saffron known for its purity and potent flavor. A must-have ingredient to elevate your cooking and beverages, providing numerous health benefits such as aiding digestion and improving mood.

newArrivals.name: Edible Rose Water
newArrivals.description: Pure, edible rose water that adds a delicate fragrance and flavor to your dishes, desserts, and drinks. Known for its cooling properties, it helps with skin rejuvenation and digestion.

hotSales.name: Cranberries
hotSales.description: Tangy and delicious dried cranberries, perfect for baking, salads, or snacking. Rich in antioxidants, they support urinary tract health and boost immunity.

hotSales.name: Dried Kiwi
hotSales.description: Tart and sweet dried kiwi slices, packed with vitamins and fiber. Great for snacking or adding to trail mixes and smoothies for a healthy boost.

hotSales.name: Kehwa Masala
hotSales.description: Traditional Kashmiri Kehwa masala, a perfect blend of spices and saffron. Ideal for brewing a warm, soothing drink with rich flavors and health benefits like improved digestion.

hotSales.name: Honey Muesli
hotSales.description: Crunchy and nutritious muesli, sweetened with natural honey. A perfect, healthy breakfast option that boosts energy and provides a balanced source of fiber and antioxidants.
